snippet: The Colombian group Las Malas Amistades make short, quiet, lived-in songs on “Maleza”; Greg Lewis puts Thelonious Monk’s music through an organ.
abstract: Ben Ratliff reviews Las Malas Amistades album Meleza, Cooly G release Playin Me, self-titled album debut from Holograms and Arnaldo Antunes, Edgard Scandurra and Toumani Diabate collaboration A Curva da Cintura.
lead_paragraph: The Colombian group Las Malas Amistades make short, quiet, lived-in songs on “Maleza”; Greg Lewis puts Thelonious Monk’s music through an organ.

headline.seo: Albums From Las Malas Amistades and Cooly G
headline.main: Laid-Back Colombian Folk and Angsty Swedes
headline.print_headline: Laid-Back Colombian Folk And Angsty Swedes
